short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight the color of the region at the top lef corner of AWS console.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hunting for an EC2 for ages and discovered you are in the wrong Region?

It will never happen again with the region highlighter.


Originally developed by Jamie Barriga 
https://github.com/JB4GDI/awsazcolorchromeextension
(this original version does not work after AWS update)
